item.title: How to install Ruby on Rails on Windows 10

item.title: How to install Chocolatey on Windows 10.
item.description: This article explain how to install Chocolatey on Windows 10. Chocolatey is Package Management Tools that is like apt-get or yum on Linux. The following lists are the table of contents about this article. Target audience How to install Confirm Chocolatey is installed Install something to example How to check installed packages How to uninstall package How to update package Reference articles Target audience Those who want to use functions like apt-get or yum on Windows.
